content: I'm excited to check out these recommendations. I've actually heard of some of these bands, like The Neighbourhood, Glass Animals, and Pale Waves, and I love their music. The Neighbourhood's concert was actually one of the three concerts I attended recently, along with Billie Eilish at the Oakland Arena and The Weeknd at the SAP Center in San Jose. Anyway, can you recommend some music podcasts or YouTube channels that focus on indie and alternative music?
